Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Carnage Dinobot <carnage@...>

( Sorry that I am late, visiting a sick friend.)

* Carnage glared at Cyber Claw but then shrugged and continued on her way towards the CR chambers, she was damaged still from the clone's earlier attack on her and wished to heal.
She sighed, at least they weren't enemies any longer...or so it seemed.*

**************************************************

* Dinobot looked off towards the place where he had heard the battle raging, but then was suddenly surprised when Tavatron had pulled her weapon on him.
He looked at her and growled, who did she think she was...his commander?!
He felt another wave of pain from his internal wounds but ignored it, this was much more serious!
Dinobot looked at the turning blades of Tavatron's weapon but even they meant no threat to him, he looked back up at her and saw her expression soften.
One big mistake!
When she had threatened him with her sword and growled at him he was about to believe that she was really going to damage him if he didn't listen to her, but now that her concern was clearly seen he wasn't so sure.
Dinobot glared at Tavatron, the battle was over and he had missed it!
If she wouldn't have stopped him by her sudden show of force he would have at least caught the end of it!
He suddenly took the sword in his grasp and clenched his clawed figures around the whirling blades, they bit deeply but only until he tightened his grip and soon they came to a whining stand still.
His hand was bleeding and his mech fluid stained the blades of Tavatron's weapon, but the pain he felt not!
Dinobot bared his teeth at Tavatron, he didn't take threatens lightly!*

" It is unwise to use a weapon unless one is willing to KILL with it!"

* He then pushed the sword away from his chest with force and let it go, he didn't bother to look down at his hand.
Dinobot hefted the rifle and looked back towards the area where the battle had been only moments before, she was right and he knew it. He was in no fighting condition but the call of battle was stronger then the call of his own wellbeing, or it had been.
But there was no call now, just the empty and disappointed feeling in which was left after he had been cheated the thrill of a possible victory.
Dinobot looked off towards the Ark now, Tavatron had won. His systems were ready to give out and he was now running low on mech fluid, if he was on the field and fight a battle now he would fall...and fall hard!
He looked back at Tavatron and growled low, even though she was correct he was not about to surrender just yet.
Covered in fluid, damaged and weak he stood and just glared at her, with an actually weak and shallow breath he spoke...*

" And...why does what I do and do not do disturb you so? You almost seem...worried about my welfare. Why?"

* He said this with weakness but a sharp edge was still present in his voice, he had a question and he wanted it answered...quickly!*
